title: Designing for the "10-Foot Experience"
subtitle: What it is and why it changes everything.

leftBullets.title: Distant Viewing
leftBullets.description: Designing for large screens viewed from a distance (approx. 10 feet / 3 meters).

leftBullets.title: "Lean-Back" Experience
leftBullets.description: Unlike the "lean-in" nature of mobile, users are relaxed and less precise.

leftBullets.title: Legibility is Key
leftBullets.description: UI components must be large and have high contrast.

leftBullets.title: Simplicity Wins
leftBullets.description: UIs to be clean and simple for understanding.

leftBullets.title: Navigability is Everything
leftBullets.description: Interactions are driven by a D-pad, making clear, predictable focus essential.
